name: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-5-Wa: Joou Kara no Sasoi
name_original: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-5-Wa: Joou Kara no Sasoi
description:
Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-5-Wa: Joou Kara no Sasoi is an action game. It was originally released in 2011.
Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-5-Wa: Joou Kara no Sasoi is available on PSP.
